channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Internet
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Internet

item.title: CVE-2023-30674|2024-10-24T15:04:07.656Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper configuration in Samsung Internet prior to version 21.0.0.41 allows attacker to bypass SameSite Cookie.

item.title: CVE-2024-34671|2024-10-08T06:30:53.723Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication in translation혻in Samsung Internet prior to version 26.0.3.1 allows local attackers to get sensitive information. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-20869|2024-06-04T17:40:35.654Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 25.0.0.41 allows local attackers to bypass protection for cookies.

item.title: CVE-2024-20869|2024-08-01T22:06:36.821Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 25.0.0.41 allows local attackers to bypass protection for cookies.

item.title: CVE-2024-34671|2024-10-08T13:26:50.646Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication in translation혻in Samsung Internet prior to version 26.0.3.1 allows local attackers to get sensitive information. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.
